devdoc.author: jipingl
devdoc.details: chainlink VRF version is v2.5chainlink automation version is v2.1
devdoc.title: A truly decentralized Raffle

acceptOwnership().notice: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

checkUpkeep(bytes).notice: Automation will call this method to check if performUpkeep is executed

enter().notice: Users participate in the raffle through this function

performUpkeep(bytes).notice: Automation calls this method to trigger the selection of winners

setCoordinator(address).notice: Sets the VRF Coordinator addressThis method should only be callable by the coordinator or contract owner

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address.

userdoc.notice: The raffle logic of this contract is as follows:1. Users join the raffle and pay a fee.2. After a certain time interval, chainlink automation will automatically trigger the logic of selecting the final winner.3. The final winner is calculated from the random number of chainlink VRF
